The sound of hard sole boots tamp through the corridors of the Steel Heart, a light murmur becoming the distinguishable sound of chit-chat. Round a corner, came a one Zzo'olo, and a one Zia @Cap'n into the Mess Hall. The large green fellow had thr fox lady wrapped around him like some she were some statement in high fashion. "--and, if ya can even believe it, the cheeky bite'r even 'ad tha nerve t' say 'is gods were comin for us. Course, I figger it were just a hot load, if ya know what I mean.."
Cap'n 30-Oct-19 03:58 PM
She doesn't let go once they arrive, instead squeezing him gently "Of course I do, baby. So... So what's for breakfast then? Or... whatever meal this is."
zzo 30-Oct-19 04:11 PM
Her cooing affectations stop him short for a moment, just as he was reaching for a platter. Zia would notice a slitted pupil settle on her for moment before it looks away, a smile sat a few inches below there. The platter sounds off as Zzo'olo picks it up and begins to adorn it with foodstuffs. "I'm a simple guy, really. Just a bitta this, bitta that. No sweets, o' course..." As he spoke, swiveling Zia this way and that, the plate would fill with five quite sizeable eggs, unhatched, uncooked, a very large portion of red meat, and what was this? His hand hovered above a bright orange carrot, but only for a moment, zagging to the left to grab a few skewers of some kind of meat-on-a-stick. They garnish the platter, sitting on top. "...think that should do it...would ya like anything?"
Cap'n 30-Oct-19 04:12 PM
"Oh you know me, I just eat for effect. Something small will do me fine after last night..." She smiles warmly, kissing his neck slightly before taking a seat
zzo 30-Oct-19 04:20 PM
"Ah, ahaha--" A laugh escapes Zzo'olo in spite of himself, a hand going to his neck where her kiss lingered. He watches her take a seat, then unassumingly looks back to the spread...there were a few contempo style plates; small portions of what were, to him, unknowable morsels of probably-food. The discerning eye, and taste bud of course, would see a serving of pan seared duck, garnished with fine cut vegetables, a quail egg, and a white wine reduction. Fancy stuff, contempo. Zzo'olo shrugs and grabs it, along with his own hoard, and moves to sit near Zia. "So ya know, I couldn't find hide nor 'air of ya since just after we met, back in that pub. Where'd ya run off to anyway?"
Cap'n 30-Oct-19 04:24 PM
"I had... Well, I had to go back here. Given my history I was kinda putting your team in danger by being there. The church would've killed you to kill me so instead, I left and, well, we're trying to get this sorted out so I can leave more freely again..." Her tail surrounds his back as she shuffles a little closer, leaning into him "Are you cosy enough?"
zzo 30-Oct-19 04:48 PM
As Zia explained, she may or may notice Zzo'olo jaw dislodging so that he might better stuff one of the oversized eggs into his gullet. The large shape of it distorts the keel scales lining his throat as it goes down, disappearing into his chest. He would put an arm around her as she scooted in, and bopped loose his vocal cords with the other hand. "Pardon--and yes, I am quite cozy, thank you for that..Honestly though, 'tween the gnoll gods 'avin it out for me, now this church--wait a tick, ain't tha church tha ones what's gonna 'elp ya?" He asks, the picks up a meat skewer to chew on.
Cap'n 30-Oct-19 04:50 PM
"Yes and no... I'm still a fiend... they're getting good ones registered but that means they still hunt the unregistered... to my understanding anyway. They're the ones who've hired the paladins who've forced me to move too many tines..."
She gives no sense of discomfort, surrounding him gently throughout, ending her speech with a lick to his cheek as her speech ends
zzo 30-Oct-19 05:01 PM
She would catch the subtlest drop of what we would consider teriyaki on his cheek as her tongue made contact. Meanwhile, Zzo'olo was mulling over her words. They'd rather kill them both than just let her be, this church? He chews slowly, reverie breaking once she licks him. Zzo'olo swallows the morsel, "Don't reckon I like tha sound o' that. Not one bit..." He thought it best to stop himself before going off on a tengent. The arm around Zia pulls her in reassuringly. "If these blokes're tough as ya say, it sounds like I'll have my work cut out fer me. So whaddya 'spose ye gonna do now, while I'm down there straightenin' em out?"
Cap'n 30-Oct-19 05:04 PM
"Tough isn't a word I've used. I just thought that moving away would get less attention than killing someone... I never really considered if I could... Although... I guess the thought of making someone so devout turn on their religion is a kinda... oddly hot thing... But... anyway, I'm safe so long as I'm onboard this ship and I'm safe so long as I get registered correctly. Unlike a lot of other demons I don't leave a trail of corpses in my wake."
zzo 30-Oct-19 05:10 PM
"Reckon that leaves your soul a fair bit light'er than mine.." he replies, no stranger to leaving "messes" behind him, and still taking down food. The platter was about half-done. "Even still, no worries, we'll 'ave ya sort'ed out 'fore ya can say Helm's yer uncle, and you'll be free as a bird."
Cap'n 30-Oct-19 05:16 PM
"Well, I've been free a while. It's just those who follow after that's the problem. But... whatever... Since I'm safe here, we'll see how things develop." She gently strokes his cheek "I'm certainly not complaining about our closeness."
zzo 30-Oct-19 05:31 PM
"Aye, safe 'ere indeed. I been 'earin talk o' the guild gainin' a few bodies as well. So likely, I bet yer bound t' see plenty developin'..." Her soft hand on his cheek was titillating, to say the least. Zzo'olo quietly puts his gaze on her, and would try to glean what kind of emotions she was putting out. Eye contact was important for stuff like this.
"An' yer not gonna 'ear it from me niether."
Cap'n 30-Oct-19 05:37 PM
"I... I'm not so sure what you mean but whatever, right." She leans her head on his shoulder "I'm... I'm not overdoing this at all, am I? I mean..."
zzo 30-Oct-19 05:54 PM
"No--no no, nothing like all that." He'd seen what he was looking for. His hand connected to the arm around Zia rests softly atop her head, digits juxtaposed by her ear. "I guess I jus' ain't tha sparklin' conversator I play meself off as. Jus' thought I'd try it on. You an' me, we neva 'ad a chance t' talk much, ya know?"
Cap'n 30-Oct-19 06:03 PM
"You're plenty good at it. Just... I mean... You're projecting a lot of emotions at the moment... Sorry... Ask whatever you want to know my dear."
zzo 30-Oct-19 06:22 PM
"Ah right, that--it's nothin t' worry ovah. Jus' 'ad a weird dream is all...does it make ya nervous? Me mistress always said bein' intense an' mysterious helped fill tha stands." he says matter of factly, giving her a gentle rub atop her head, "I guess fer start'ers, is there anythin' else ya can tell me about succubi? Ya seem t' 'ave a whole mess o' talents. That go fer all of em, or jus' yaself?" he asks through a smirk. (edited)
Cap'n 30-Oct-19 06:24 PM
"Well, seducing people is kind of our deal... though far too many of us go to dirty charms rather than just talking or sucking someone off in a tavern... But, being here sure beats being home..."
zzo 30-Oct-19 06:34 PM
The sentiment catches him off guard, and coaxes out an unrestrained belly laugh. Luckily he managed to avoid spraying whatever he'd been chewing. After composing himself he smiles at her. "Always such a minx, you... So ow'd you wind up so diff'rent than all the rest of em?"
Cap'n 30-Oct-19 06:36 PM
"I told you why I was summoned right? I was summoned by a guy who wanted a wife. So I had to learn to be a wife. A lot of shit was different to being at home so I came into different means... Especially after he cheated on me and broke the contract."
zzo 30-Oct-19 06:45 PM
"You did tell me, but I don't think I realized at tha time, jus' how bad the place was that you came 'ere from." He would rub her shoulder consolingly, then swallow down the last egg. //sorry but i gotta get to work, I can respond again in a while

zzo 31-Oct-19 01:19 PM

Cap'n 31-Oct-19 01:20 PM
She settles in against him, somewhat irritated at the prospects but certain Zzo will keep her at least mostly safe (edited)
zzo 31-Oct-19 01:24 PM
BOOM! The door to the kitchen swings open as though it had been kicked by a horse! Pots, pans, and other kitchen implements spill out onto the floor. One after the other they tumble out, crashing loudly, some spinning to a stop. Zzo gulps down the rest of the egg and grabs onto Zia's shoulder as she leans in and the racket crescendos. "What the bloody f--" When all of a sudden, several tomatoes come floating from out of the kitchen door...He blinks at them, beyond confused, only for the produce to come sailing at the pair! Dexterity Saves!
Avrae BOT 31-Oct-19 01:25 PM

zzo 31-Oct-19 01:31 PM
Splort!! A tomato whizzes passed Zia's fox ear, but Zzo'olo hadn't been so lucky...The tomato slides slowly down his face and drops with a wet sound into his lap. He looks at Zia, face covered in juice and tomato seeds. "This prolly ain't good--come on!" Zzo'olo would scoop up Zia and run with her in his arms to a table near the mess hall's communication tube, whereupon he would flip a table onto its side, just in time for a butcher's knife to pierce the wood! "Stay down!" Zzo'olo urges her before skittering over to the tube and yelling into it... @Player "All available 'ands! We've got a problem in the mess 'all! An' bring a bloody cleric!!"

Deleted User 01-Nov-19 09:32 PM
He reached over, grabbing a plate and covering it in whatever protein food's he could spot. "Sorry for startling you, little lady, didn't mean to do that. He chuckled once more in hilarity, not yet understanding social queues due to the fact he's quite unintelligent. "Your name is?" He asked. He didn't like to make it awkward, so he gently shoved himself into a conversation with Keena, obviously not getting the fact she was trying to get food.
His monotone Irish/Australian accent booming loudly throughout the almost empty mess-hall. He didn't get that he normally yelled when he spoke either.
Cap'n 01-Nov-19 09:36 PM

Deleted User 01-Nov-19 09:41 PM
He grabs her hand gently, understanding she isn't a man and therefore doesn't need to grab her hand firmly "Jack, nice to meet you Keena." Jack smiled back at Keena, his bushy beard and mustache making an odd noise as he crinkled his face in and up, into a smiling formation. He glanced back down at her chest and stomach, checking her for weapons due to paranoia. He looked back up at her face, letting her hand go. Keena obviously noticed something was off with Jack. "You say you have something on your mind, Keena? You want to chat about it, yeah?" He asked, content with his question.
Cap'n 01-Nov-19 09:46 PM

His look down her front didn't bring particular comfort but she hoped he was checking for weapons rather than eying her up. She lifts her tray and starts walking for a bench
Deleted User 01-Nov-19 09:51 PM
He lifted his tray, spinning it on his finger as if it was a ball. Obviously not getting the point that gravity exists. Luckily, their way to the benches, his food didn't fall. "So you know, Keena, I think you may have saw me checking you out, it was not to see how good looking you are. As I do not care about that at this time. I'm checking for weapons." His eyes narrowed as he sat down at the bench directly in front of where she was sitting down. He sat his tray down and glanced up, watching her seat herself. "So, you want to talk about it now? You do seem quite stressed over, which may be nothing." He said to her, beginning to feel like a dick for what he said.

There came from down the corridor a curious and repitive squeak, heralding the rustle of a curiously colorful and glossy fabric. The door to the mess hall would be pushed open then, revealing the large and wide stature of a red dragonborn, face adorned with a pair of jet black lenses of sun obfuscation. Gorou had lost Takeshi somewhere along the tour, and as such eventually wound up getting quite lost himself. Whether drawn by dumb luck, or perhaps just following his nose, Gorou finally finds himself standing some feet away from a glorious looking spread of food. A single tear rolls out from the bottom of one black lense... The clatter of plates came shortly after, as a tail happily sways in the air, hands pile food on platters. Gorou spins about with a nice armful of delights, and would sit at the nearest table. He claps his hands together, quickly and quietly murmurs his thanks, then promptly digs in with face and claws alike.
zzo 22-Nov-19 05:37 PM
Gorou takes a moment to sit up, delicately daubs at his lenses with a napkin to clear away some errant splatters of juice, then dives back in to his many plates of food.

There was some concern about his beastly transformation curse and, truth be told, the red head didn’t fault anyone at all. She’d been assured that he’d be in good hands, receiving excellent care. And that they had accommodations for when the curse took its hold. Fortunately, the new moon had just passed, so time was on their side... for now. In the mean time, Sela was doing her best to get acclimated. She’d spent the last few years of her life dedicated to honing her skills and searching for Barachiel. Oh Barachiel... how she’d missed him. His smile, his touch, his warmth. Her heart had swelled the moment she’d rested her eyes upon him... her other half had been found. Her brother. Her twin. Her... The girl’s cheeks reddened. She hoped her brother was all right. Suddenly, Sela’s tummy rumbled and she smiled shyly, moving towards the food that had been set out like a glorious buffet. Her golden eyes shone, as her mouth began to water. She was hungry. Her body urging her to sample a little of everything. Immediately giving into the temptation, she grabbed a plate and eagerly began to fill it.

Mors | Garg | Bof 10-Dec-19 12:31 AM
"I have only tasted strawberries once, they were ok but my favorite fruit are, believe me or not, bananas" Bofwant told Sela as they stepped into the mess hall, he was trying to help her relax and let her mind rest a little, he was a hard man, not the best one making conversation, before his training to be an officer he was really quiet and had no manners at all, but he was different now. He leaded her towards the food and grabbed a big tray with 2 plates and glasses, "We lived in the tropics, a jungle on our backs and the sea in front of us, when we didn't have money to buy meat, we used to explore our 'backyard' and find all kind of tropical fruits, I even had found a special kind of banana that cooked with oil becomes really sweet and tasty... Maybe if we find some in the gardens I can teach you how to cook them properly, for now let's grab some food."
@Iri | Sela | Hal - FERTILE
Iri | Sela | Hal - FERTILE 10-Dec-19 12:48 AM
Sela followed Bofwant to the mess hall, making sure to stay by his side, as they walked down the stairs and through the various halls. It was difficult at first to match his stride, his legs so much longer than her own. But she managed all the same. Sela then smiled up at Bofwant when he told her the story of bananas. They sounded wonderful and now she was curious to actually try them. “That actually sounds delicious,” she said, her cheeks turning rosy. “I... I’d very much like you to show me how to make them,” she admitted, her eyes moving away from his, so she could stare at the floor instead. “You’d really teach me?” The girl looked back up at him once more, her lips curved into a smile, one that reached her golden eyes. One that could make someone almost forget those large scars stretching across her otherwise pretty features.
Mors | Garg | Bof 10-Dec-19 12:55 AM
The ex soldier filled their plates with food, also grabbing some strawberry sweets and a couple of normal bananas, then grabbed a jug of watermelon juice, "Of course I will Miss Sela, they are really tasty and easy to cook, you only need a little oil and they give you a lot of energy, they saved us from starvation more times that I can count." He told her as they say down on a empty table. Bofwant grabbed the jug and filled the glasses, "Now let's eat, the mind works better with a full stomach and a good conversation, tell me more about your dancing lessons, you really seemed to enjoy those memories..." He told her and waited until she started to eat before doing so himself, it was part of his training in good manners. (edited)
Iri | Sela | Hal - FERTILE 10-Dec-19 01:11 AM
A small smile lit up Sela’s face, as she watched Bofwant put the strawberries on a plate. It was a small thing he’d done, but it meant the world to her and she appreciated it very much. Once their tray was full, she followed him to a table and sat herself down. “This looks lovely,” Sela said, her tummy suddenly rumbling. She then reached down to cover it, slightly embarrassed at the low growling sound. Giving Bofwant a sheepish look, she took a bite and swallowed it down. “Mm... yes,” Sela went on. “Dancing was the one thing I loved to do and did rather well.” She sighed softly. “Perhaps one day I can show you,” she offered. “Though... if you’d rather not, I won’t.”

My brother told me that when he started to learn how to brew alcohol so we could have a little extra coin..." (edited)
Iri | Sela | Hal - FERTILE 10-Dec-19 01:37 AM
The smile never left Sela’s face. It made her happy to know that someone approved of the things she enjoyed and held dear. She could almost believe Bofwant was praising her, feeling a sense of pride in the woman she’d become despite the darkness that had riddled her life. The red head looked up at him, cheeks rosy and bright. “Well, I’d love to show you, if you’ll let me,” she said. “If you can believe it,” she went on. “I’ve actually never even tried alcohol.” Her blush darkened and she looked away. “Though I am fond of the scent of wine,” she admitted, hoping she didn’t seem naive or foolish.

Iri | Sela | Hal - FERTILE 10-Dec-19 10:50 AM
Sela’s face paled at the mention of their father. How she hated that man. His fists. His hands. His presence had never been welcomed. It always brought fear and utter disgust. She could still feel his hands touching her, while his eyes devoured the rest. Barachiel had done well to stop the worst of it. But she’d never been able to stop his hands. “Never with our father,” Sela mumbled, her knees moving so she could hug them tightly to her chest. “Not ever.” Her voice hitched for a brief moment. If one hadn’t been paying attention, they might not necessarily notice. “And we didn’t have friends. I... I think he was just preparing.” She paused a moment, her fingers twisting some of her fiery red tresses between them. “We often dreamed of leaving. It was a game we played to help make the days a bit... brighter.” Sela did her best to smile then. But it didn’t quite reach her eyes. Not this time. She sighed softly, before reaching for the last of the strawberries.
Mors | Garg | Bof 10-Dec-19 11:07 AM

Oh what a curmudgeon he’d been! But the man had been like a father to her. She missed him terribly and would always love him. “He took me in and trained me when my own family left me alone. He... he saved me when I nearly died by the poachers’ bear trap. He... he... he protected me when the poachers invaded his home. He put himself in harm’s way so I could escape.” Tears suddenly began to fall, but the words wouldn’t stop. She wanted—no, needed—for Edgar to know. “But they saw me, Edgar. Iri | Sela | Hal - FERTILE 16-Dec-19 07:44 AM

Iri | Sela | Hal - FERTILE 18-Dec-19 06:17 AM
Without realizing it and just acting on instinct, Rose just snuggled close to Edgar. It was strange being around someone who cared. And what’s more, someone who actually showed affection. Horace has been like a father to her all her years growing up in the mountains, but the man had rarely hugged her. For him, words and actions had been enough. While Rose never doubted the old man had loved her, it was far nicer and more comforting to be in the arms of someone who... wait. She was getting ahead of herself. Edgar couldn’t love her. Could he? Pursing her lips, she settled on him being fond of her. Well, at least until he told her otherwise. They have friends. Allies. It’s probably why my family wanted me gone after everything.” The eladrin would never forget those cold words spoken by her parents. Why would we accept you now that you’ve brought this upon us? This is the price you pay when mingling with humans. One day this man would see it. He’d understand then. “I just want people understanding what they are facing and potentially getting themselves into.”

Said Juma before her lips released a light giggle and took another bite from her plate, ejoying the meal~

There was colorful peppers amongst the spicy noodles.

Mors | Garg | Bof 14-Feb-20 03:42 PM
Mors walked carrying Irithriel in his arms, he was being careful with her while scanning the room for any threats. When he found none, he started to walk towards where the food was displayed, thanks to his broken memories he could only recognize some of the things available to them. He frowned a little and then lowered her to the floor. He looked into her eyes for a second and then kissed her. As long as she was with him, his memories didn't matter, he decided. "What would you like to eat little mate?" He asked her after breaking the kiss. He already had seen some tasty meats for him but he didn't know what she would like and the healer said that she would know what would be best for her and their child growing inside her.
@Iri | Sela | Hal - FERTILE
Iri | Sela | Hal - FERTILE 14-Feb-20 05:28 PM
Irithriel has laid her head down against Mors’ chest, her arms wrapped about his neck lovingly. She sighed softly against him, just wanting to be close to the man she’d feared might forever have been lost to her. There truly were no words to describe her happiness now that she’d found them and now that they could forge a future together. As Mors walked, Iri’s senses were suddenly bombarded with the aroma of food. It was much stronger than it had been in the past, another sign of her pregnancy. But now they knew for certain. And in the near future, they’d have a son—heir to a legacy, a little boy to love and cherish. She knew their first born would grow to be strong much like Mors. The pretty elf able to imagine the goliath training their little one once he was old enough. “Mmm...” Iri sighed when Mors lowered her to the floor. Her gray eyes scanned the grand display of food about them. The girl bit down on her lower lip when she noticed the spicy broth. “I’d like that,” she said, pointing to the reddish concoction that simmered in its pot. As Iri approached it and inhaled deeply, she could smell the spices and vegetables, the meat. Yes, the spicy stew would be perfect. “It’s making my mouth water,” she then admitted, her cheeks going pink.
Mors | Garg | Bof 14-Feb-20 08:21 PM
Mors chuckled a little, somehow he had known that she would be hungry after all the excitement of knowing they were going to have a boy. He just moved and grabbed a tray, filling it with different kinds of meat, some juice and filled a bowl with the broth. Just before he turned around to find a table he saw some colorful food, sweets. He remembered and picked some for his mate, the memories playing behind his eyes for a second. He closed his eyes and focused on the now, holding the tray full of food with one hand and with the other he grabbed Iri's hand and softly pulled her with him towards the closest table. "Let's eat, as much as you want." He grolwed softly after pulling her to his lap. He didn't want to be separated from her right now because he had realized that he almost lost all this, his family, and didn't want to take any chances. "You can also eat anything you want as long as you don't get distracted." He said and suddenly a small group of minions appeared from the shadows and happily went to pick all kinds of different foods, "Food!..." just like Mors they were still surprised that they didn't have to kill for their meal in this place. (edited)
Iri | Sela | Hal - FERTILE 14-Feb-20 10:51 PM
Oh that laugh, that smile! Irithriel was beyond elated that she’d managed to get her Mors to do both. She would never forget the first time they’d met on the top deck. She’d been so certain the man was incapable of either. And then, when her feelings had begun to change, she’d hoped that one day she could see him smile. Now... now, she was the one who made him capable. It made her feel warm and pleasant and loved. “Oh, my beast!” Iri exclaimed, as Mors brought over some food. She’d just situated herself at their chosen table, her slim fingers smoothing out the sheer lacy dress barely concealing her body. Behind her Mors, she saw the little greens pounce on the delectable display. She hardly blamed them. Everything looked so decadent and amazing! Giggling softly, she then reached for the food Mors had set before her. And it didn’t escape her notice that he’d brought over a helping of sweets. Oh, he was remembering! And that meant the world to her, touching both her heart and her soul. Iri dug in to the broth, loading it down with meats. She reached for some bread to accompany the savory and spicy flavors. “Mmm...” she sighed contentedly. She was in heaven! As she ate, Mors pulled her into his lap. Immediately, she responded, nestling against him, her body easily molding against his own. “Mmm... love you...” she whispered before turning to kiss the goliath’s chest. She nuzzled him then for a moment and returned to eating her food. “This is delicious,” she went on. It was clear she was so very happy. “Also, I... I was thinking... we should marry on the top deck. Where we first met. Would you like that, my beloved beast?” she asked.
Mors | Garg | Bof 15-Feb-20 11:47 AM
Mors groaned pleased when she nuzzled him and kept eating her meal, and he started to do the same, grabbing some pieces of meat with his bare hand like he used to do in the jungle while his other hand just rested over her belly. He quickly devoured the things he had picked for himself but didn't move to get more food, just stayed there, happy to let her have her fill before doing anything else. While he waited he thought about the ceremony, the ship was not flying over frozen territory anymore so despite being high it was warmer than before when they arrived from the jungle so his mate wouldn't be exposed to harsh temperatures. "Yes, that sounds good. The minions will help to set up any decorations you want." He said to her and kissed her shoulders, "would you like to invite some of those fools that were in the jungle?" He asked her softly, his eyes glowing. He wouldn't mind fighting those idiots again, that certainly would be entertaining he thought.
Iri | Sela | Hal - FERTILE 15-Feb-20 01:04 PM
Irithriel sipped at her soup, savoring each delectable bite. The spicy flavor danced on her tongue, making her feel alive and energized. The meats and bread balanced it out perfectly, making the meal simply delightful as she ate. “Oh that would be wonderful for the little darlings to help with the decorations. I want them to be something we both like and want. Do you have any preferences? Something to remind you of your jungle? Something from our books?” she prodded, wanting Mors’ input. Cuddling closer, Iri placed her hand over Mors’. The pretty elf could tell that he was already enamored with their unborn child. He’d be a wonderful father and teacher. Oh how she longed to meet their son! “Hrm... yes, I’d definitely like Warden to come,” she said softly, sweetly. “He’s teaching me to sew. Perhaps I can try making a blanket for our son. It... it probably won’t look the nicest,” she mumbled. “But it will be made with all my love.” Her cheeks darkened to a rosy red, her gray gaze suddenly fixating on the floor beneath them. “ We can ask the others if they’d like to come. They are certainly welcome. All our guild mates should be. But I... I’ll understand if none of them do.” Everyone had seemed so cross and untrusting, while they’d traversed the jungle. A part of Iri feared that she and Mors had lost the friends she’d thought she’d gained. There wasn’t much that could be done there. The girl had paid them, as promised. And she’d done her best to keep everyone safe. Unfortunately, not everyone seemed to understand that. Or... they didn’t want to. No matter. Iri would never hold it against them, but she’d be sure to give them their space. The hurt she felt was real, though she hoped it might ease with time.
Mors | Garg | Bof 15-Feb-20 07:46 PM
The Overlord spent a couple of minutes in silence, thinking about his mate's words and just enjoying having her in his arms. He had not really a preference for things of the jungle, it was just his kingdom. Where we woke up for the second time apparently so he had decided that it was going to become his and that was what happened. He enjoyed the general feeling of danger thought, the constant battle for survival, the way he had used his strength to dominate everything around him. "As long as it doesn't look like a waste of resources I will be fine with it...." He couldn't lie to his mate but she was excited for this ceremony and he didn't want to upset her telling her that he didn't care much about it... Meh, it was better to be honest. "As long as you are with me I will like it, I don't care much about decorations or crap like that... We could have music for a dance." He finally said, the memory of dancing with her flashing behind his eyes for a second, he just nuzzled her and tightened his arms around her a little. "And yes, I like the warden with the hound, he's useful." He confessed without a care, "and anything you make will be no less than perfect little moon. Any idiot that says otherwise will suffer my wrath and will wish they weren't born, not even that idiotic goddess blessing will be able to save them from the suffering I will make them feel." His voice started to raise little by little until it was echoing around them thanks to the evil energy coming off him.
"We can invite the other idiots that are around the ship, even that strange priest that thinks he's a female...." He offered after calming his bloodlust a little, focusing on the feeling of his mate's body instead. "And remember what the healer said, don't push yourself.... What about you little mate, what would you like? I don't know how your kind do these ceremonies... Or mine." He finished with a small frown. He could remember some of his kind, like his mother and brothers but only small flashes of how they looked like.
Iri | Sela | Hal - FERTILE 17-Feb-20 05:26 AM
“Oh, I don’t want anything too elaborate,” Irithriel stated. “My parents had wanted some gaudy affair prepared for the day they’d planned on myself and Evindal marrying.” Her face flushed and she looked down at the floor. She hated remembering her past back in the Feywild. The courts. Her family. Very little provided good memories, most of her happiness starting when she entered the material plane. “So, I want nothing resembling their vision.” Iri pouted sweetly just then, leaning back and cuddling close to Mors. “I was thinking something simple, yet lovely. Perhaps some flowers from the garden. And maybe a few handmade things, if we’re able.” Her blush consumed her body, the pretty pink peeking through the sheer lace just barely covering her body. “Does that sound all right to you?” For a moment, Iri went silent, turning to just look up into Mors’ eyes. She wanted this wedding to be them. Not just her or even just him. It was a shared day. Something special she hoped they could remember as their years together passed. “Simple and surrounded by whoever of our guild mates would like to be there. We... we can come up with our own vows. Just something simple from the heart.” The pretty elf bit down on her lip. “Do you approve, my beast? Will you... will you mind?” Her gray eyes blinked several times. “I want you to love our day as much as I will,” she then admitted, her tone one of shyness and hope.
Mors | Garg | Bof 17-Feb-20 12:19 PM
Mors looked into her eyes and raised both of his hands to softly hold her head in place, his thumbs caressing her lovely cheeks. "Yes, little moon. Of course I approve. We will have our own ceremony, as we like it. Forget about those fools, no one will impose their idiotic traditions on us." He told her without looking away from her eyes and then gave her a small kiss. "I have no idea what I would like." He confessed to her, "But I know that as long as I'm with you, I will enjoy it... He suggested with a smile because of course he found violence entertaining but he knew that his mate didn't like to see her friends get hurt, so if the Healer was going to be there then it would be safe to have some fights if there were some brave enough to fight him. Iri | Sela | Hal - FERTILE 17-Feb-20 05:32 PM
Irithriel made a soft little noise when Mors mentioned the sweets. Yes. She had a most terrible sweet tooth. Back in the Feywild, she’d been considered a disgrace because she would never attempt to skip dessert. All the other elven girls managed to resist, but she’d never shown will nor want. Not that it mattered any longer. “Yes, I’d love to have sweets,” Iri agreed. “A whole variety for everyone.” The girl giggled softly and then buried her face against Mors, letting it stay that way for several moments before pulling back and looking up into his eyes. “And... and that’s a lovely idea, my beast,” she went on in regards to his desire to host sparring matches. The pretty elf knew those were important to him. So that made them important to her as well. “I know you love to train. And if Mr Bofwant doesn’t mind extending his services further, then we should certainly include that. Perhaps we could have a sign up list for our guests. Then we could put teams together, one on ones, or something like that.” The smile that tugged at Iri’s lips made her face absolutely radiant. And I’ll make sure to include a reading from our first shared fairytale.” Her expression turned thoughtful, as she thought on the book up in their room. The book that had changed their lives forever.
Mors | Garg | Bof 17-Feb-20 06:16 PM
"Good." The Overlord said with a smile, he hadn't cared much about this ceremony but now it sounded promising. A day to show the world that Iri was his and some fights. Yes, this is going to be good. He asked her softly while resting one of his big hands over her belly again. It had been an exiting day for her so far and He had listened to the healer's words. He wanted to make sure that she was feeling alright. The minions were done eating and some were just lazing around while a couple kept watch for enemies. Good enough. Iri | Sela | Hal - FERTILE 17-Feb-20 06:53 PM
“I’m feeling well, my beast,” Irithriel assured Mors. “I definitely needed the food. So thank you.” The girl smiled sweetly and dabbed the corners of her mouth, her lips with a nearby linen napkin. Mors | Garg | Bof 17-Feb-20 09:11 PM
"Yes, I would like that little moon." The Overlord answered her, moving both of his hands to her hips and carefully taking her off his lap and putting her on her feet. He stood up from the table and grabbed Iri's hand, pulling her against him so he could kiss her again before they started to go back to their room. He didn't understand why he felt so at ease with her or how he enjoyed every moment with her, specially having her in his arms but he also didn't fight it, she was his mate after all, it just felt right despite his broken memories. "Do whatever you want, just stay on your guard. And kept an eye on that fool from before." Iri | Sela | Hal - FERTILE 17-Feb-20 10:59 PM

Avrae BOT 17-Feb-20 10:59 PM
Mors | Garg | Bof 31-Mar-20 07:06 PM
Garg DreadStorm, the heartless sharkin entered the mess hall looking for some food. He closed his eyes and took a deep breath, using his powerful nose to filter the different scents that were in the air. After locating the most fresh piece of raw meat he opened them again and moved towards the table that had the food. He grabbed a tray and filled it with different kinds of raw and bloody meats, then he sat on the nearest table and started to eat using his bare hands, enjoying the bloody meat and not caring about the disgusting display he was making.
Iri | Sela | Hal - FERTILE 31-Mar-20 10:37 PM
Though the shark was much larger than her, Hal was able to keep up with him. The elf nimbly sprinted, her light footing having no trouble matching his lumbering strides. ‘He is so loud,’ she thought to herself, shaking her head. Flaming hair swished about her porcelain pale features, a perfect frame to her pretty face. Hal watched the shark move into the mess hall like he owned the place. She decided to pay it no mind. Perhaps there were reasons he acted as he did. It was something she could understand. She’d been terrible to her brother when he’d first tried to open her eyes. He forgave her easily though, knowing it was a result of her upbringing and training and... brainwashing. The girl shivered then, shaking it off by following suit and grabbing her own tray of her preferred foods. When Hal sat down, she took a space across from Garg. She didn’t let her eyes focus on what he was eating or how. Instead, she kept her eyes fixed on her own tray, the display of food much more appealing and appetizing. She bit off a hunk of bread and swallowed it down. “So, as I’d asked earlier,” she stated, though no anger or frustration showed in her tone or manner. “Who are the Silver Knights? And why is the ship important?”
Pendragon, Rok, Hero 01-Apr-20 04:43 AM
"And this is the mess hall" he said

Mors | Garg | Bof 01-Apr-20 07:24 PM
Garg had been enjoying his food and ignoring Hal. Despite now being in control of his instincts, the smell of a fresh kill had made him really hungry, so he was filling his belly before answering any questions. When Ford arrived at the table and pulled pork his cards he stopped eating and growled at him. "The fuck are you?" He asked a visibly licked the blood on his sharp teeth. Then he turned towards Hal, "And you Shadow girl, aren't elves supposed to have manners and shit? You don't talk business while you eat, for that you need some drinks..." He finished with a low growl and started eating again.
Iri | Sela | Hal - FERTILE 01-Apr-20 07:32 PM
Hal ate some more bread and then washed it down with some water. She licked at her lips and sat back slightly. Letting out a slow exhale, she tilted her head and let her eyes slide to the shark sitting across from her. “Then after our meal, we head to the bar for some drinks.” It wasn’t a request. The girl wanted and planned to talk business. It would only help them all if she understood the details of the job she’d be helping on. With a soft sigh, Hal turned toward the man sitting next to her. He was obviously another guild member. But was he older or newer like herself? She wasn’t certain. The girl tilted her head, her blue eyes scanning him before resting on his face. “Nice to meet you as well,” she began. “I’m Halanaestra, but I prefer just going by Hal.” At that, she dug into her meal of meat and potatoes. After the training and meandering, she needed some decent sustenance. Besides, she’d need food in her belly if drinks became a thing afterwards. (edited)

Mors | Garg | Bof 03-Apr-20 04:15 AM
Garg finished eating his meal in a few bites, his mouth opening more than before, showing that he could eat like a normal shark and so he could finish quickly to get things done. He started to lick his teeth while looking at Ford, not even bothering to read the cards on the table. "I know sailors like you..." The sharkin growled, "Idiots that got their tongues cut because they stepped out of line..." He said and crashed a fist against the table, making things jump a little and the shadows of his coat extend forward. They started to twist and change until they formed a small illusion that showed a man being relieved of his tongue by another sharkin, this one looking like a white shark and a very dangerous one.
Garg growled again before waving his hand, the same one that had hot the table. The shadows started to change once again until they showed a small longboat that started to sail around the table. "Are you here for the job like the shadow girl, mute boy?" The captain finally asked.
impulsive ram 03-Apr-20 04:34 AM

Iri | Sela | Hal - FERTILE 03-Apr-20 07:57 AM
Hal took another swallow of water and then set down her cup. Her blue gaze had followed the strange swirling images, the little story shown there clear enough. A small shiver ran along her spine, such images hardly foreign to the girl. Baron Elvinor had always been ruthless. She then looked to the newcomer who’d just introduced himself and tilted her head. With a soft expression, the elf shook her head, fiery hair framing her face. “I’m sorry, I don’t know sign. Maybe you can teach us all if that’s easier for you,” she then suggested. As a newer person, she wondered if that might be a good idea to get him to meet others, as well as share a skill that could be useful for all. As a former spy for house Phiarlan, knowing Thieves’ Cant had its uses and the language often required hand gestures to accompany the sounds of the voice to ensure the context was fully understood. Licking her lips, Hal then turned back towards Garg, the little image of the boat still quite visible before them all. “Looks like he can speak a little,” she stated, though it was clear Ford seemed uncomfortable using his voice. “Why not give his story a listen?” she then prodded Ford, figuring it wouldn’t hurt for this new person to at least listen. Perhaps if he also helped on this job it could help him in some way. After all, Mr Clay had said the guild was a family, a place to make friends... not just find sanctuary. The girl hoped to do just that on this job. Every little bit would help her make up for her foolishness at having followed the Phiarlan matriarch so blindly. Never again. “So please,” Hal then said, her words meant for Garg. “Tell us both about this job. Who are the Silver Knights and why is this ship so important?” (edited)
Mors | Garg | Bof 03-Apr-20 11:14 AM

To talk business, you need drinks..." He growled as he stared to walk out of the mess hall. He waved his tail behind him, making the small ship grow in size and sail through the air, following him. Iri | Sela | Hal - FERTILE 03-Apr-20 11:34 AM
Hal ate the last bite of her food, her eyes narrowing just slightly at Garg. The shark must be one of those unique sorts Mr Clay had alluded too. Well, even unique people need friends, those you can rely on... At that, she got up, her slender body moving to put away her tray before following the shark to the #bar-lounge. As she left, she gestured for Ford to follow.

Ippo 09-Apr-20 06:17 PM
Meanwhile, Parker ( @Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) ) and Riwo arrive, once again hand in hand. It certainly smells like a mess hall should, and as a whole the space is warm and cozy. Hard to believe it's on a mercenary airship. Riwo is willing to let Parker take the lead in choosing where to sit, and what to eat. He just seems happy to keep them company, as evidenced by his never-still tail.
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 09-Apr-20 06:28 PM
Parker chooses a seat on the near wall, setting out the ukulele for later. They leave and return a bit later holding bowls of something that looks a lot like chicken garlic stirfry. "I don't know what you like so.. hopefully this is good." They sit and shove a forkful into their mouth, moaning delightedly at the flavor. "God, this is so much better than cup o' ramen."
Ippo 09-Apr-20 06:32 PM
Riwo, who had waited for them at the table, cocks his head in that way he does to signal curiosity. "Raw men?" Delicate fingers cover his mouth, and his cheeks puff out as though stifling laughter. "Goodness, I didn't realize you were that type of person, friend!"
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 09-Apr-20 06:35 PM
"Whaddya mean?" They clearly don't get the joke. "S' just cheap, shitty noodles. Was eating a lot of them when I was doing school - college is expensive as hell, can't spend much on food."
Ippo 09-Apr-20 06:41 PM
Riwo's head cocks to the other side now. "Um, oh? Why would you call noodles... Anyway! Thank you for this meal, friend. I love meats and noodles!" He gets right to eating as well, his fangs flashing as they comp down on the morsels brought to his mouth. A long, pointed tongue will often emerge to lick either his fingers or the fork. In particular, he seems to relish the meat parts of the meal the most, as his nostrils flare whenever he bites into them. (edited)
Lilia 09-Apr-20 06:43 PM
Lilia continues staring at the meat that Rok had prepared. Seems like she's just waiting for it to cool down, but doesn't exactly know when that may be.
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 09-Apr-20 07:03 PM
Parker quickly finishes off their bowl, setting it and a glass of water aside while they take a moment to tune the ukelele. It's not hard- they've been playing it in taverns, in town squares, for a good two weeks now. The thing could practically play itself at this point. The bard- loudly clears their throat, grabbing the attention of a couple patrons, and gives their regular spiel about playing for tips. "Aaanyway, here's wonderwall!" And they begin to play. Playing music feels different in this world. The motions are the same, the required tuning and precision unchanged. But the feeling... Is so much stronger. Those nearby might almost feel the joy emanating from Parker as they play this lovely tune, and sing the lyrics they've memorized long ago. It's an unironic favorite of theirs and, though they don't see it, others might be able to spot soft light on their fingertips, emanating into the strings wherever they're touched. They play a few more songs before setting down the instrument and grabbing their water. Parker looks at Riwo. "Welp. Um.. there's my playing! Whatcha think?" (edited)
Ippo 09-Apr-20 07:20 PM
Aside from a whoop! when Parker announced themself, Riwo watched the performance in silence, and with a big smile. He and his tail swayed gently throughout it. His eyes don't fail to catch the light Parker creates. When it's all over, Riwo applaudes with more hooting and cheering. "Yaaaay! That was awesome, friend! I've never heard that song before, but that was a really nice! Did you write it yourself?"
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 09-Apr-20 07:47 PM
Parker snorts into his drink, trying not to laugh. "Oh, god no. All those songs were by musicians from Earth. I'm glad you liked them though! Some of my favorites. They sound better on guitar honestly but," they shrug, "what can you do, right? I'm trying to save for more instruments actually, but I don't know what a fair price is for these things." They're smiling, happy and filled with pride. No tips today, but they were a new member of a probably right knit crew - they'd figure something out later. At least now they'd eaten something (free something!) and made a lot of progress in the reading debacle with their new friend. (edited)
Ippo 09-Apr-20 07:54 PM
(Oh, that reminds me! Do a performance check!)
Lilia 09-Apr-20 08:00 PM
During the performance, Lilia brings her meal over to the table to get a better viewing distance. She keeps her eyes locked on her dish, but her tail and bum noticeably sway on her seat.
Ippo 09-Apr-20 08:03 PM
Parker might think they're not getting tips, but Riwo wasn't the only one clapping. While many of the rough and grizzled types in the mess hall were just minding their own business and making no sign of acknowledging them, others came over to drop coins on the table. By the end, Parker had accumulated 23 silvers, and 10 coppers--a hefty sum for one song! Riwo is still impressed, despite Parker's modesty, but before he can give more words of encouragement, Lilia had joined them. He holds out his hands to her, saying, "Hey, girl, heeey! How are you? You came to listen, too?"
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 09-Apr-20 08:11 PM
Parker jumps when the first coin is dropped, and kind of just... Stares as more accumulate until there's a significant pile. "Hhhholy shit??" They don't recall the exchange rate between copper, silver and gold, but it's still so much coin, they're going to lose their mind. The musician quickly scoops all the coins into the ukulele case. They notice the second person a second later. They're another nonhuman, one similar to Riwo in looks, and they don't tense up quite as much as before when this fact is noticed. "Hhhey there, I'm Parker Wise. Did you enjoy the song?"
Lilia 09-Apr-20 08:17 PM

Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 09-Apr-20 08:19 PM
They snicker. "It's not gonna tell you when, dude. Is the bowl still hot?"
Ippo 09-Apr-20 08:20 PM
Riwo's ears twiddle and bounce--a curious cat--and he too leans over the table to sniff the dish. "Hrmm... Hey, wait a minute, Lilia, we're fiends. We don't care if something is too hot to eat!"
Lilia 09-Apr-20 08:21 PM

“Ah yeah yeah, but Mr. Rok said not to eat when it is hot.”
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 09-Apr-20 08:22 PM
"Here lemme-," Parker leans over and puts their palm on the side of the bowl. It's about lukewarm, would probably get thrown in the microwave if those existed here. "Yeah, you're good amigo. Chow down."
Lilia 09-Apr-20 08:26 PM
“Ah! Yum yum!” She squeals, reaching down to pick up the chicken piece before taking a big bite out of it. A piece of the skin hangs from her lower lip but she hardly notices, chewing what’s in her mouth already.
Ippo 09-Apr-20 08:34 PM
Riwo cocks his head at her. "No, no, really, we're heat resistant, Lilia. We can eat things that are very very hot without getting hurt." Well, it can't be helped. Everyone has their preferences. Seeing the piece of chicken hanging from her mouth, Riwo leans in even closer to sniff at it, his tail sticking out straight. Then, his pointed tongue gives it a tentative lick.
Pendragon, Rok, Hero 09-Apr-20 08:40 PM
Rok was still in the kitchen, boiling bones into a broth, while chopping meat and veggies. He had noodles already made
Ippo 09-Apr-20 08:53 PM

Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 09-Apr-20 08:59 PM
Parker sees this and drops their head on the table. What's the legal drinking age here?
Ippo 09-Apr-20 09:11 PM
"Friend, is something the matter? Are you tired?" Riwo peers over Parker with his tail low and apprehensive.
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 09-Apr-20 09:17 PM
They grunt noncommittally. They definitely are tired- they haven't had a restful night's sleep since August, but this past while has been especially stressful. "I need alcohol," they say instead. "Will they card me here?"
Ippo 09-Apr-20 09:20 PM
One head cock of a curious fiend later, Riwo says, "Card?"
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 09-Apr-20 09:27 PM
They lift their head to look at Riwo. "Y'know like an ID card- you don't know. Know what? I'll take what I can get. And what I can get is a fucking beer. Be right back." Parker stands up and makes their way to the bar where they stay for a minute before returning with a flagon of ale that they're eyeing a little suspiciously. They finally shrug and sit. "It ain't budlight but if I get wasted, I don't care." They take a long swig of the drink and make a face. "Gross. I love it." (edited)
Ippo 09-Apr-20 09:30 PM
Riwo's ears twiddle, and he breaks into a smile when Parker tries the ale. "You're a really strange person, friend Parker--and that must be weird coming from me."
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 09-Apr-20 09:33 PM
They take another drink and nod, but there's a grin as well. "Oh, absolutely. But I'm sure I fall a little outside the norm for humans in this world, so it's whatever."
Ippo 09-Apr-20 09:43 PM
"You say 'world.' Do you mean 'plane?' Are you from a different part of the universe?"
Lilia 09-Apr-20 09:50 PM
Lilia giggles as Riwo takes the meal from her lips. “Yeah! Guess so! It is tasty.” She continues to eat, stuffing her face by biting the meat like a dog.
Ippo 09-Apr-20 09:55 PM
Riwo watches Lilia go to town on her meal, and he looks to his own empty bowl. His tail sways in thought. "E-excuse me, Lilia, do you mind if I join you? My noodles didn't have lot of meat in them, so, maybe we can share, if isn't a bother."
Lilia 09-Apr-20 10:03 PM
Lilia peeks up, meat filling her cheeks. “Mmnff?” She waves her hands to show that her meal is free to take. It was free to begin with after all.
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 09-Apr-20 10:07 PM
Parker gives him a 'what are you on' look as he puts down his ale. "Are you talking about the planes described in that book you were teaching me from? I'm pretty sure I'm not from any of those. They wipe the liquid from their top lip and continue. "I'm from a planet called Earth. It's a magicless world -maybe part of this universe, maybe not, I don't know- with humans as the only sentient species on it. I got pulled here from there by something I don't understand or even know about really at all. I'm just trying to get by, really."
Ippo 09-Apr-20 10:11 PM
At that, Riwo's tail wags again, and like two dogs sharing a bone, he joins Lilia in gnawing at her meal. Fangs gnash, nostrils flare, and eyes shine as Riwo tastes meat in his mouth. From time to time his tongue will flick out to clean what's on Lilia's face. But when Parker asks for him to elaborate, he looks up from the dish with full cheeks, and swallows before saying, "Yeah, that sounds like an alternate plane. It's strange that yours is devoid of magic, as you say, but lots of places have singular denizens. Lilia is a succubus, so she's from the Abyss, which is inhabited solely by demons."
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 09-Apr-20 10:49 PM
They hum thoughtfully. "I guess it's as possible as anything else... Admittedly everything Earth has about the multiverse theory is just that- it's all theory. That makes it incredibly frustrating to figure anything out, especially now. I can't be sure if anything I know is actually accurate or legitimate information."
Ippo 09-Apr-20 10:57 PM
Riwo wags his finger at Parker. "Ah, well, my friend~ I know for a fact that there are extraplanar dimensions in this universe. Otherwise, how would you explain magic, or the gods?"
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 09-Apr-20 11:01 PM
"Particularly potent energy, a widely common ability in sentient beings to use such energy for their goals, and gods would probably be some 'ascended' form of beings who harnessed this energy source to ultimate perfection," Parker rattles off without a beat. It's clear they've considered this many, many times. "Or, that's what I would have said if I wasn't able to use magic - being not of this world I wouldn't have evolved with the abilities necessary for that to be possible. It would be a trait I would never be able to possess." (edited)
Ippo 09-Apr-20 11:05 PM
Riwo hums as he considers that. "Well, humans generally aren't naturally inclined towards magic. Most of the time they have to spend many years studying and practicing if they seek to wield it. Only a small percentage can spontaneously cast it. Lots of other races are just born with them."
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 09-Apr-20 11:11 PM
"Which-," they take another drink and feel heat settle deep in their bones, but they aren't drunk yet. They look at the cup. It's still half full. What the fuck. "-which only further proves that theory I told you is pure horse shit. I'm not from here. If it was a purely evolutionary thing I wouldn't be able to do it. But judging by your reactions earlier, I've been learning spells incredibly quickly - spells, mind you, that I didn't know existed three weeks ago. So what's the answer? Is it an affect of this plane, that anyone within it can miraculously harness this energy? I don't know. I want to know." They pause. "...I also need to stop rambling and just let myself get quietly drunk. Sorry." (edited)
Ippo 09-Apr-20 11:14 PM
A warm, delicate hand pats Parker on the head. "Then I'll stop talking about it as well, friend. You have the book, so you can even read up on the subject later. For now, enjoy yourself!" He gets up with his hands folded in front of him, and leans closer to Parker as though halfway into a bow. "Would you like for me to get you another drink?"
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 09-Apr-20 11:16 PM
They nod with a sigh. "That would be great dude, thanks." They pick at the strings on their ukelele thoughtlessly, plucking out a patternless tune.
Ippo 09-Apr-20 11:19 PM
Now Riwo does give a bow, and pads away to the bar, returning with another flagon that is set in front of Parker. "Here you are, friend. Please enjoy~" he says, and sits beside them.
Pendragon, Rok, Hero 10-Apr-20 12:09 AM
"Ya'll wanna try some orcish grub?" Rok called out from the kitchen. He was frying up pork belly
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 10-Apr-20 12:10 AM
"Oh. I will." They stop fiddling with their strings and toss back the remains of the first flagon, grabbing the second with a disgusted expression, though otherwise no hesitation. "God. What the fuck is in this beer? Fucking. Damn." They glance at their little instrument again. Y'know what? Fuck it. Parker stands up and waves the ukulele in the air. "Who wants to hear another song?" They turn around and see a big grey man in the kitchen. "I have no idea! What that- what that is! But! Yes!" (edited)

Well, that's neither here nor there!" He points to a bone left behind in the dish. "Do you want tha--o-oh, hello, friend Parker! That's very good! Are you sure you're in the right state to do it? You've had quite a bit to drink today."
Without waiting for an answer from Lilia regarding the bone, Riwo takes it to give it a gnaw before his reflective eyes fall on Ford. This one he didn't recognize, but this is a day for first encounters, so he waves them over with the bone clenched between his sharp devil's teeth. "Hello, fwen! Welcome!"

Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 10-Apr-20 12:47 AM
(ohhh ok cool cool)
Parker has, admittedly, never performed drunk. This was not something they assumed would matter. It absolutely did matter. They strum a few notes. Lean back in their seat. Lean a little too far back. Just as they're about to get started on a baller rendition of Little Lion Man, the musician finds themself crashing to the floor and hitting their head on the table at their back. The lovely notes cut off violently as Parker swears just as harsh at the offending furniture, as if it definitely wasn't their fault. "Fuck! Ow! Why! Just wanna - fuckign-! Shit!"
impulsive ram 10-Apr-20 12:53 AM
Ford walks over and offers a hand to help them up
Ippo 10-Apr-20 12:54 AM
So, Parker holds the shipboard booze, but barely. Their poor Earth body isn't used to such raw mixture of barley and hops, and though their vision is starting to get iffy, they're not quite gone yet. That being said, it certainly affects their performance. Maybe it's been a long day for them as well, or the people who tipped them earlier didn't feel like giving anymore coin, but nobody drops anything in the ukulele case this time. By the twiddling of his ears, Riwo at least feels their embarrassment, and perhaps it's for this that they try to sneak 4 of their own silver into the case.
And with the tumble, he joins Ford at the scene with the sort of sympathetic look a mother might give to their child after a poor stage performance. "Are you hurt, friend? Will you need a curative spell?"
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 10-Apr-20 01:01 AM

Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 13-Apr-20 08:08 PM
Parker enters the mess hall with Riwo, messing with the strings of their ukulele as they wander in search of a seat. Now that they've been insistently pulled away from their reading, the young adult could feel the clenching of their hungry stomach, and the full pulse of an overworked headache. There's a thing like gyros prepared by that blue, wind-voiced woman.
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 13-Apr-20 08:18 PM
( @Ippo )
Ippo 13-Apr-20 08:59 PM
Riwo, in his usual way, pads after Parker, insisting they choose where he should be positioned as they walk through the halls. Whatever the choice was, they end up in the mess hall. "I for one can go for some meat morsels. And yourself?" he says to his companion.
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 13-Apr-20 09:02 PM
They point with an eager look towards the meal they'd noticed, then place their instrument on a centered table to claim it. "The Gyros look good. Haven't had one of those in a while."
Ippo 13-Apr-20 09:05 PM
Riwo cocks his head, then wags his tail at the sight and scent of what Parker indicated. "Oh! Meat wraps! I very much enjoy those, friend." Assuming Parker descends upon the gyros, Riwo will follow him with his hands together, but he'll way until they take one first before getting his own.
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 13-Apr-20 10:18 PM
They do that. They're more careful eating it since they can't see all the ingredients and they honestly have no idea the unfamiliar foods that grow on this planet, or if they're edible for the Bard. But god damn it's delicious. Warm, amazing bread that wasn't quite pita, well seasoned lamb strips... God. Yes. Fuck yes. "Ugh, this is amaaazing. Reminds me of my dad's restaurant." (edited)
Ippo 13-Apr-20 10:29 PM
Riwo joins in the enjoyment of these meat wraps, as he calls them, but when he sees Parker after their first bite, he brings his tail up, saying, "Ah, friend, you're so silly. You've made a mess of yourself." The end of his spaded tail rubs the edge of Parker's mouth, revealing that a tiny bit of sauce had spattered there.
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 13-Apr-20 10:38 PM
They- Parker does not expect to flinch at the contact, but they immediately feel bad about it. Their face turns red and they focus very intently on one piece of tomato in their gyro to avoid seeing whatever reaction Riwo has. "...sorry. thanks."
Ippo 13-Apr-20 10:41 PM
Riwo is taken aback by the reaction. His tail recoils, and his ears flatten before rising back up. By his demeanor, perhaps Parker's reaction wasn't unexpected. "No, no, no, I'm sorry, friend. I should've asked first."
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 13-Apr-20 10:45 PM
They shake their head and don't say anything for a second. "You're the only... Not human-looking person that I've... Deliberately interacted with? Besides um.. Mister Clay and the other people from last night, I'm trying to get over it but it's all.. still kind of unsettling. It probably would've helped if I hadn't avoided all the orcs and tieflings and dragonborns but..." The sentence trails off and they take another large bite of their food, but the implied end is clear. Fear, confusion, instinct kept them well away from anyone who looked... Dangerous.
Ippo 13-Apr-20 10:53 PM
The end of Riwo's tail bobs as he listens to Parker give his explanation. "That's understandable, friend Parker. This is all very new to you, and it takes time to acclimate to a foreign environment. But I'm really glad that you've interacted with me--I really hope I'm helping."
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 13-Apr-20 11:01 PM
Parker thinks for a moment. "...Yeah, you're cool," they finally say. It's sincere, despite them still eyeing the wrap in their hands like it's the most interesting thing to ever exist. "And yeah, you uh. I think I've been a little better about it all. As far as, like, the looks of people, y'know? Still seems weird but not uh... Quite as scary. Mostly, anyway."
Ippo 13-Apr-20 11:04 PM
"Eyes up here, friend," Riwo whispers, but with a smile. "You're pretty cool, too. I think my motherly instincts kick in when I'm with you, for some reason. Maybe one day you'll see that I'm not so scary!"
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 13-Apr-20 11:07 PM
They look up, studying Riwo for half a second before relaxing. He wasn't upset. It's okay. No shouting is happening here. They're fine. They smile and nod. "Yeah. You aren't that scary. I think those twins were scarier than you, honestly. And they don't have any sharp teeth or horns."
Ippo 13-Apr-20 11:09 PM
Riwo cocks his head, his smile turning sympathetic. "Still don't know who they are, but I'm glad you like me better, I guess...?" Looking down at his own gyro, Riwo holds it up to Parker. "Let's try something: I'll eat from your wrap, and you can eat from mine. We'll hold them up for each other like this."
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 13-Apr-20 11:15 PM
Parker nods, because their comparison makes sense to them, but they look at the gyro that Riwo holds up with confusion. Why would he...? Trust? A show of security? They supposed it wouldn't hurt, the man has never shown to be anything but gentle (to Parker, at least). And it's a give-and-take scenario he's presenting. Mutual. All these thoughts run together in a second, before Parker makes up their mind and, carefully, nods. They hold up their wrap in a skilled manner that won't spill the contents. "Um.. okay?" They take a bite of Riwo's food, presuming that he'll do the same.
Ippo 13-Apr-20 11:22 PM
A big, fang-filled grin comes over his face, and Riwo mirrors Parker by holding the gyro up to his mouth. His jaws open, revealing the sharp teeth within, and he chomps down on the tasty, garlic-saucy snack with the gusto of a dog with a treat. Unless Parker decides to take it away, Riwo will eat it until it's gone.
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 14-Apr-20 10:20 AM
Parker leans back after eating their bite, then finds themself unexpectedly laughing at Riwo's manner, which they've seen of him before but is a bit more amicable to their mind now. Well. Fine, if he wants to try that, Parker could do the same. They take a larger bite of Riwo's similarly flavored wrap and leaves their own in the air for the acolyte to eat freely. They ignore the teeth as much as possible (it's easier when the thought of their father's Greek restaurant is tapping at their memories) and eat Riwo's wrap until finished.
Ippo 14-Apr-20 10:28 AM
Soon, Riwo's long, velvety tongue is lapping at Parker's hand where the sauce and meat juice had covered, at once looking like a bat and a dog. Only when their fingers are clean does he turn the tongue upon himself, licking around his mouth. He gives Parker his big devil smile. "Thank you, friend, that was lovely~ But, um... Oh, right! Did that help? Maybe now you're more comfortable around someone with teeth like mine!"
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 14-Apr-20 10:46 AM
They crack a grin. "'s better," they admit. "Odd way to go about that I think, but... Yeah. Yeah."
Ippo 14-Apr-20 10:56 AM
The toothy grin doesn't go away, even as Riwo's fangs part to lick his own fingers. "Well, what else can we do to help with that?" (edited)
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 14-Apr-20 11:17 AM
"Probably nothing...? I don't know. I think I want to at again though." Parker holds up the ukulele again. "Want to hear another fancy-pants Earth song?"
Ippo 14-Apr-20 11:20 AM
"Kinda, yeah," Riwo says with a wagging tail. "Music's very good after a meal." He sits at one of the tables, facing Parker with his hands folded on his lap, looking much like a parent watching their child at a performance.
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 14-Apr-20 11:31 AM
Parker snickers and rolls their eyes lightly. They pluck a few chords out before determining the thing would not need more tuning, and starts their rendition of another favorite: The Mariner's Revenge Song.
(performance roll?)
Ippo 14-Apr-20 11:36 AM
(Is Parker trying to make money off it?)
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 14-Apr-20 11:46 AM
(they wouldn't mind getting some, but no, no announcing this time.)
Ippo 14-Apr-20 11:50 AM
(Then no need to roll. We can just imagine they do an average performance (so it's as if they rolled between 10 and 14))
Riwo listens, body and tail rocking from side to side in rhythm with the song. It's a perfectly decent performance, and no one who happens to be there can say that it wasn't enjoyable, even as background music for their meals. By its end, Riwo gives Parker rapid, delicate claps, his mouth open and smiling. "That was really nice, friend! It was a lot darker than that one you played yesterday," he says--and there's just a tinge of excitement in his eyes as he says it.
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 14-Apr-20 12:02 PM
Their satisfied grin turns... slightly sharper than normal. It's odd to see on their normally zen or nervous face, but it's most likely just from the energy of the music. "It's a good one, yeah. Fits some of those angrier moods, but it's perfectly fine to play on a regular. Very satisfying, I'm glad you liked it. I'm going to find a few songs from this world to play eventually, but for now I have a fairly good collection to work from memory."
Ippo 14-Apr-20 12:07 PM
"Well, you're in luck. There are lots of other bards on the ship, and I bet they'd love to teach you a song or two. You'll have to ask them, of course."
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 14-Apr-20 12:09 PM
"I'll be sure to do that! Bards cant be the only musicians though, right? From what I can tell they're defined by being able to do magic with their music, that can't be a universal trait of musicians here."
Ippo 14-Apr-20 12:11 PM
"Well, yeah. Though normal bards are still called bards. It's a little confusing, I know." Riwo got up to hold his out for Parker. "But now that you've actually eaten something, is there anything else you wanted to do?"
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 14-Apr-20 06:38 PM
They make a face. "That's annoying but alright." They smile a bit and take Riwo's hand. "Well, hmm... what's a place you like?"
Ippo 14-Apr-20 07:09 PM
Riwo shrugs his shoulders and pouts his lips in thought, making a sound of uncertainty. "I mean, the chapel is my favorite place on the ship, but there's not much to do there. What are you feeling up for?"
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 14-Apr-20 09:07 PM
"Well... I don't know how much I have, if it's enough to get anything, but I need more supplies, clothes, and I want to rebuild my collection of instruments. Do you know where I can get those things?" (edited)
Ippo 15-Apr-20 12:29 AM
"Well, a lot of that stuff can be found on the ship. As an adventuring guild, it behooves the Clays to keep stocked with the usual field supplies--though a lot of it needs to be paid for. But as for instruments, perhaps you'd have to find some in one of the towns we pass."
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 15-Apr-20 12:39 AM
They look confused as Riwo says this, clearly having forgotten exactly what this place is supposed to be. "Town's... We pass?"
Ippo 15-Apr-20 12:42 AM
He cocks his head. "We're on an airship, love. We fly over things, but often make stops to resupply, or drop off and pick up adventuring parties."
Reese (Thrin✨Tomara✨Parker) 15-Apr-20 11:41 AM
There's a beat, then they remember. "Oh right! Huh. Alright. Well I mean... I think I might just wander then? The odd hologram lady showed me around but it was a very short tour. Gonna... Gonna do some exploring!" (solo time, going to #the-thinktank ) (edited)

Az (Cheer/Margot/Lott) 04-May-20 01:13 PM
Margot, after her recruitment, felt it was time to have something to eat. So, she made her way to wherever the mess hall was. She then started to figure out what to eat.
@Lilia
Lilia 04-May-20 01:14 PM
Lilia skipped back into the cafeteria, eager to find some new foods to try and eat. Running around the ship was fun, and she never got bored with the rooms she found herself in.
Az (Cheer/Margot/Lott) 04-May-20 01:17 PM
Margot noticed the skipping woman going through the cafeteria, and noticed that there was something to her that felt different. Certainly wasn't something she was entirely familiar with. She then moved towards the woman. "Do you know anything about good dishes in this place?" Asked the Half-Elven necromancer.
Lilia 04-May-20 01:19 PM
Lilia stopped in her tracks and placed her arms on her hips. "Hmm! Good dishes...Lilia thinks all dishes are good if they do what dishes do, yes yes?"
Az (Cheer/Margot/Lott) 04-May-20 01:22 PM
This woman only refers to herself in third-person? How strange, Margot thought. "That is not descriptive enough. What meat dishes are there?" Margot said. She was, indeed, feeling like meat today.
Lilia 04-May-20 01:39 PM
Lilia squinted her eyes. "Meat dishes...? Like dish made out of meat? Oh! Or or, dish of meat! Umm, you can ask cook man. Usually he know what people like, yes."
Az (Cheer/Margot/Lott) 04-May-20 02:43 PM
“Thank you.” Margot when to the cook to get her food.
Lilia 04-May-20 03:28 PM
Lilia followed along, curious to see what she got.
Az (Cheer/Margot/Lott) 04-May-20 04:12 PM
Margot got a medium-sized pork pie from the cafeteria and then sat down to eat with a fork.
Lilia 04-May-20 04:13 PM
Lilia grabbed an apple before taking a seat next to Margot. "What's that?" She asked with a crunch.
Az (Cheer/Margot/Lott) 04-May-20 04:15 PM
"A meat pie." Margot said. "With pork inside." She made an opening with her fork to show the contents inside. "There is supposed to be a sweet sauce used in this, so It'd best be good."
Lilia 04-May-20 04:20 PM
Lilia leaned close to take a sniff. "Ooh...interesting...maybe Lilia will get some of her own one day." She moved back into her spot and spun the apple on the table. "Apples are very sweet, yes yes. Maybe you can put apple in it if it is not sweet enough."
Az (Cheer/Margot/Lott) 04-May-20 04:23 PM
Margot takes a bite out of it after blowing the steam off of it. "It's fine enough as is." Margot said. She then continued to eat. Although, she still had a certain thought in her mind. "What kind of race are you, honestly?" Margot asked. "Like, I am Half-Elf, Half-Human. But I feel something special about your presence."
Lilia 05-May-20 01:03 AM
Lilia tilted her head, watching Margot eat, then tilted her head the other direction. “Ah, Lilia is a Succubus, yes yes. See? Wings?” She flapped them to make sure they were still there.
Az (Cheer/Margot/Lott) 05-May-20 07:49 AM
“That explains it.” Margot said. “It’s similar to the feeling I once felt around some rituals of raising the dead. That brings me a little closer to the truth...”
Lilia 05-May-20 12:53 PM
Lilia's ears perked up. "Ooh? Magic, yes yes? That sounds like magic for sure!"
Az (Cheer/Margot/Lott) 05-May-20 01:00 PM
“Yes... magic.” Margot semi-parroted. “Demonic magic. I have not seen a succubus before, but you aren’t like how they were described to me.”
Lilia 05-May-20 04:48 PM
Lilia frowned, twisting her torso to look at herself. "Eeee, what do you hear then? How is Lilia different? Lilia is a special succubus?"
Az (Cheer/Margot/Lott) 05-May-20 04:50 PM
“They said Succubi are sexy, meant to attract those for whatever the Succubus desires. I am not gay, but you come off as more cute. Not against that, just stating that I did not expect this.”
Lilia 06-May-20 04:42 AM
Lilia’s smile grew across her face, stretching from ear to ear. “Eee! Lilia is cute?! That’s good, very good!” The girl seemed extremely pleased by this statement and seemed to worry less about the rest of the conversation.
Az (Cheer/Margot/Lott) 06-May-20 08:08 AM
Margot kept a neutral face. With some perceptiveness, Lilia would see that Margot wasn’t even making eye contact. She was just looking behind Lilia as she ate.
Lilia 06-May-20 10:00 AM
Lilia stared with blank optimism before going back to eating her apple and spinning it on the table.
Az (Cheer/Margot/Lott) 06-May-20 12:06 PM
Margot kept eating, although she paused to speak. “What is being a Succubus like, anyway?” Margot asked the warm-colored succubus. “Is it any different from what I have been told?”
Lilia 06-May-20 03:27 PM
Lilia shrugged her shoulders. "Lilia dunno what ya been told. Lilia thinks she lives normal life. Ya know, adventures, eat yummies, meet friends."
Az (Cheer/Margot/Lott) 06-May-20 03:56 PM
“What about experiences with sex?” Margot questioned. “And the people you have attracted?”
Lilia 06-May-20 08:16 PM
Lilia frowned, rubbing her chin. "Well, Lilia gets that, yes yes, it is fun, but Lilia doesn't look for it, ya know? It's nice when it happens, though, yes yes."
Az (Cheer/Margot/Lott) 06-May-20 08:20 PM
“Interesting.” Margot said. She continued eating her meat pie. “I suppose I have asked you enough questions. What would you have for me, a half-elf?”
Lilia 07-May-20 05:36 AM
“Ooh! Are ya half down the middle, or half like top and bottom??”
Az (Cheer/Margot/Lott) 07-May-20 08:12 AM
Margot was silent. “You can say it’s half elf everywhere, I suppose.”
Lilia 07-May-20 12:48 PM
Lilia scrunched her face in deep thought. "Like a polka dot dress!"
Az (Cheer/Margot/Lott) 07-May-20 01:21 PM
Margot was not sure what that meant, but she supposed she’ll take it. “Do you have anything else for me before I go and mind my own business?”
Lilia 07-May-20 03:56 PM
Lilia shook her head, taking another bite of the apple and finishing it. "Nuh uh! It was nice to meet ya, ye ye? Had funf." Lilia finished chewing and swallowed the apple before tossing the core into a nearby bin.
Az (Cheer/Margot/Lott) 07-May-20 03:58 PM
Margot was down to a quarter of her food left. Definitely has been a good pie. “It was... funf for me, too.” Margot said. “Once I am done here, I’ll go find myself a room. You are not to disturb, alright?”
Lilia 07-May-20 07:44 PM
Lilia tilted her head. "You can disturb Lilia! It is okay. Her room is somewhere." She waved a finger around in the air.
Az (Cheer/Margot/Lott) 07-May-20 08:03 PM
“I’ll only disturb you if I need anything.” Margot said. “Otherwise...” Her pie was fully eaten now. Margot gave out a small burp she covered with her hand. “I’ll be leaving.” She then stood up from her table and left, leaving her plate and silverware behind.
Lilia 07-May-20 09:19 PM
Lilia blinked at the leftover dinnerware, picking it up and bringing it back to the kitchen before heading on her own way.
